column1: '''Galador''' was the first [[Prince of Dol Amroth]].

According to legend, Galador was the son of [[Imrazôr]] [[the Númenórean]] and the Elf-maid [[Mithrellas]].<ref name="PM"/> Following the drowning of [[Amroth]], the seat of the [[Princes of Dol Amroth
column2: Princes of Belfalas]] was renamed in his honour. Galador founded [[Dol Amroth]] and became its first [[Prince of Dol Amroth
column3: Prince]], his ancestors having held the title "[[Prince]]" since the time of [[Elendil]] and ruling [[Belfalas]] at least as long.<ref>{{UT
